content: watchman s cap laura sorbara materials yarn size 50g of julie asselin nurtured heavy worsted/aran s m l weight 100% wool 119 m / 130 yds per 50g skein or any worsted weight equivalent finished measurements circumference 43cm / 17 needles 5mm / us 8 - 16 circular and dpns height 18cm / 7 5 notions 8 9 10 stitch markers tapestry needle gauge 19 sts = 4 in stockinette unblocked watchman s hat 1 of 2 © handknit yarn studio 2019 pattern using the long-tail method cast on 80 90 100 sts join for working in the round being careful not to twist stitches pm for beginning of round brim round 1 k1 p1 repeat until end of round repeat round 1 until piece measures 9cm / 3 5 or desired height from cast-on edge body knit in stockinette stitch until piece measures 14cm / 5 5 or desired height from cast-on edge shape top set-up round knit in stockinette stitch placing one stitch marker every 10 stitches round 1 decrease k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm repeat 8 9 10 times to end of round round 2 knit repeat rounds 1 & 2 until 8 9 10 sts remain break yarn and thread through remaining stitches on needle pulling tight to close finishing weave in ends block if desired watchman s hat 2 of 2 © handknit yarn studio 2019
